website_summaries.verdict: A diffuser specifically made to fit in the car so oils won’t spill all over the interior while driving.
pros: Diffuser has a design made specifically for the average vehicle cup holder
Sits securely in the holder during tight turns
Provides around five hours of scented use before needing more oil
cons: The included USB cord will need to be secured for use while driving

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this diffuser. Very surprised at the amount of vapor. Works great. I use my essential oils in it. Turn it on every time I get in my car. Great pricing and fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: GLORIA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your car/cup holder
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me for Valentine's day. I am a delivery driver, and it's perfect when I'm feeling stressed out or if I smoke in my car. It really freshens and adds moisture to the air so I'm not so dry or stuffy. Perfect for a small room too. It is a very good quality product and we'll made. Very sturdy for such a small product.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: I use this in my car with grapefruit scented oil ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my car with grapefruit scented oil. Wakes me up and refreshes me during my early morning ride to work.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the car and fits right in the cup holder
customer_reviews.text: I love my diffusers and was excited to be able to have one in my car too! This works wonderfully in my van, I have it in a cup holder and without the lights on in looks like a coffee cup. I highly recommend this for any car.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: My kids love smelling the aroma and of course watching the lights
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my car with an immunity defense essential oil. My kids love smelling the aroma and of course watching the lights. It fits perfectly into a cup holder.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Good quality little diffuser!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this diffuser for a couple of years now and never had any problems with it. I also use it in the house and well as the car too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's relaxing for your car. The color changing is pretty cool. Kids love it too !
customer_reviews.author: Lexilex1010

customer_reviews.title: Will do no wrong with this
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best travel diffuser! Follow the directions and lines of where to fill the water line and you will have not problems.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Kline

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this car diffuser. It sits in my cup holder and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Cute little  car diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping. Diffuses quite a bit out for being so small.
customer_reviews.author: crawl5

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for in my car
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for in my car. I had to replace last one (different brand) that clipped to my car vent that came loose and fell off causing it to break 2 days after receiving it. This one is amazing. I am very happy I purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: A great on the go diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is the perfect size for your car and works great! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Great small and powerful diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Very nice diffuser I use in my hotel room while traveling very happy
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: SO SO GREAT and I am picky when it comes to oil ...
customer_reviews.text: SO SO GREAT and I am picky when it comes to oil Diffusers. I keep it in my car but also use it for my bathroom and bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my wife and we both love it. Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife and we both love it. Works really well, and the color changing dynamic works awesome too. For the price and the usability of it, we would both definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: nick crookston

customer_reviews.title: I got this diffuser for my office & I love it. It was delivered quickly & is exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this diffuser for my office & I love it. It was delivered quickly & is exactly as was described. Easy to use, convenient & very effective for the size! Buy it, you will love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amber L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It worked for 15 minutes... literally
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a car ride to dinner and when we got back in the car it didn’t work Again!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Wallace

customer_reviews.title: I love this diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I love this diffuser! Works amazing in the car! Customer service is amazing as well! I bought 5 for gifts
customer_reviews.author: Ann Ott

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful little gem. Fits nicely in my cup holder and let's me enjoy my essential oils on the move.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love. Works for about 2 hours then shuts off love at my desk. Coworkers love it
customer_reviews.author: Dana L. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' my diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying having an oil diffuser in my car. When I take long trips, a touch of peppermint keeps me energized and focused!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Grammer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Easy to use. Wish lid snapped in place to avoid water spillage but it's in cup holder so no big negative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this diffuser. I use it in my car while on road trips and when I am home on weekends I use it to diffuse Young Livings Purification in my bathroom where the cat litter box is. It plugs in via USB but any cell phone charger that has a USB capability will work just fine to plug this into an AC adapter. I love it! It is large enough that on the intermittent setting it truly does run for 6 hours. It looks lovely at night and makes the bathroom smell so good.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great diffuser to use in a small space. Works great in my office cubicle.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diffuser. Use it in my car every day! Easy to keep clean and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best car diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: I can't brag enough about this car diffuser! I had a plus in that was a piece of crap but this one requires no filters and works wonderfully! I use it so much that I pretty much have to refill it just about every other day.
customer_reviews.author: CJC

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my daughter and she loved it, so I also bought one for myself. Awesome diffuser and love that its portable!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing design
customer_reviews.text: Diffuser works fine but disappointed that it shuts off before it's empty because of the way it's made.
customer_reviews.author: carla schenk

customer_reviews.title: Works, but maybe too much...
customer_reviews.text: This thing works well... Almost too well! The intermittent setting isn't working on mine, so I just had it go at continuous and, after about a minute, I felt like I was being gassed out of my car! Had to turn it off and roll all of the windows down and turn on the air conditioner to get some of it out. I did fill the cartridge to the max water and add 3 drops of EOs, which is the upper limit (directions say 2-3 drops) so maybe I'll try again with less drops and see how it goes. You can definitely see the mist and tell it's working... and the colors are very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Gesualdo

customer_reviews.title: Not working anymore
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this diffuser just two months ago, and have used it maybe 15 times. This evening I turned it on, and though the lights work, the diffusing feature is dead. Have never dropped, spilled, or otherwise harmed it. So disappointed, feels like a waste of money now :-(
customer_reviews.author: Virginia K

customer_reviews.title: It's ok...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our car, which is a small compact car, I put the water in it and 2 or 3 drops of oil in it...not much scent at all. Next time I put 5 to 6 drops in, and got a little more scent, but it doesn't seem to diffuse much mist out of it either. The lights are nice, but really wanted the diffusing to work better than it does.
customer_reviews.author: nikirie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in return policy
customer_reviews.text: Bought several at one time in November for Christmas gifts. Started my shopping early, but that is not a good thing when returning items. Late January when a recipient of gift went to use Diffuser she found out it was defective. Can not return, too late. Disappointed. And learned for next year to do shopping closer to holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a trip and did not try it out as soon as I got it. When it was time for our trip and I put it in the car it wouldn't work, and of course my return window closed 5 days ago. 😑
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This item was perfect. It is small enough to go in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This item was perfect. It is small enough to go in the cup holder in the car, in the side pocket of a back pack, and puts out a good amount of steam for a couple of hours. It is not one of those cheap ones that have some kind of filter or paper to put oil on. It has no filter. You put the oil in the water like a normal diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: I DO NOT WANT TO BE WITHOUT!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to give this item so time before I wrote a review. I have to admit I LOVE this diffuser. I use it in my car and it is perfect since I don't want to be without my essential oil. My puppy has anxiety about being in the vehicle, so I diffuse Lavender when he is in the van and he is so relaxed he even goes to sleep. I will be buying a couple more. Thank you for such a great product that works!
customer_reviews.author: M Warnell

customer_reviews.title: so cool
customer_reviews.text: such a cool little gadget, someone decided to break into my car to steal it! very easy to use. lights can be solid color, shifting colors, or off. scented mist spreads pretty fast throughout vehicle, but doesn't really reach beyond the front seat area. if you have pets that travel with you, RESEARCH THE OILS YOU USE in the diffuser!!! some of them are incredibly toxic to dogs, cats, etc.
customer_reviews.author: William Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Compact but works like a full size diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! We have taken this diffuser with us to two trips and it has definitely been essential in diffusing our oils to keep us healthy while traveling. It's compact and fits great in the luggage, the output is awesome for a small diffuser, and we like using it as a nightlight. When filled to the max, it actually lasted all night on the intermittent setting. I'm really hoping this stands the test of time because it's a fantastic product and would hate to have to buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: RKing

customer_reviews.title: This is my 4th of this model
customer_reviews.text: I love this diffuser. I bring it everywhere I go. The only thing is I don’t like the plugs location as it has to be turned specific way & determines where it can be used also the plug connector is uncommon so that when I loose plug, I have to buy a whole new diffuser. The amount of mist depends on the quality of your cube. Make sure you have good cube.
customer_reviews.author: Mona S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The colors are so soothing and it works great! I put my favorite essential oils in it and I instantly feel better. This is great, I will take it everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a second diffuser in my home. Fits nicely and discretely between furniture in my living room so I don't have to move my diffuser when I move between rooms. Also a great travel size for hotel rooms. I also like the timer feature so it goes in bursts, rather than continuously going. No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My mom likes it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom for Christmas to use in her truck and in her RV while she is working out of town. She says it works great and does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love the portability. I can have it in my car...bring it in to work....It's awesome. I'm about to buy another just so that I can keep one at the office. =)
customer_reviews.author: Natalie M. Cipriani

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected! I think I used too much ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected! I think I used too much oil, though, because most days I got a headache. Oops.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Anderson Harris

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well nice mist if you do not overfill with water.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love this. It works well as long as it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It works well as long as it's no below zero lol. I've used it in my car and at work. Would recommend highly
customer_reviews.author: Tenderbee

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: use it two times and it quit working so it in the trash now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer   Chuck Larson

customer_reviews.title: I like this product when it works
customer_reviews.text: I like this product when it works. I have had it for 2 weeks and i keep hoping somehow it will actually run linger than a few minutes. It simply doesnt run consistently but it dies shut off consistently and seems to need to reset for hour before another short few minute run
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I use it as car air freshner. Works as humidifier (especially for the summer) and air freshner
customer_reviews.author: Jacob G.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one month.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: This diffuser worked great...for the first month. It then stopped working all together. I am greatly disappointed. I hate wasting money good money on products that don't work. I am so incredibly happy with this purchase. It works beautifully and I love that I can diffuse my oils in the car and don't have to rely on air fresheners that are filled with chemicals. I would like to recommend a bit of a longer cord though. I have to set this in my front seat cup holder, which happens to be right next to my second cup holder. Sometimes my drink get sprayed. Otherwise...pretty sure I'll be ordering another one for our other cars!
customer_reviews.author: Jonesies

customer_reviews.title: super good value.
customer_reviews.text: Makes my car smell awesome. For the price, this is a super good value.
customer_reviews.author: KetoonRepeato

customer_reviews.title: It's much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: It's much better than I expected. I use it everyday in my car. I love it. This is a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Hisako Ricketts

customer_reviews.title: Love This Car Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: So happy to have found this. Works great in my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: VA ShopperTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I purchased it with the intention of using ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I purchased it with the intention of using it in my car but I have been using it before bed and its perfect. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Alicea

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Just wish the water reservoir was a ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Just wish the water reservoir was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: techymom67

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I use this at the office. Just plug it in to computer. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Best car diffuser I've tried!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this diffuser. I've tried several other styles of car diffusers, and this one beats them all hands-down. There are two (minor) reasons why I didn't give it five stars. 1) You can barely see the different colored lights. I don't care about this, but I thought I'd point it out in case you do care. 2) It goes through water pretty quickly. I found I need to keep a small bottle of tap water in the car to refill it on longer trips.
customer_reviews.author: ReaderBabs

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: DON'T buy!!!! This portable diffuser worked for less than a month!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GigiNapa
